main event: Observers reported sightings of unidentified aerial objects in New York on 1 June 1949.
interesting points: Multiple witnesses described the object as yellowish-white and compared it to the size and shape of the moon., One observer noted a long, snake-like shape to the object., Reported sightings lasted from a few minutes up to three hours., The object appeared to move slowly around the moon before fading away., Observers did not hear any sounds associated with the object.
sighted object: unidentified flying object described as an oblong shape with glowing colors
witness description: Various witnesses including a merchant, airman, and civilians, who reported excellent character ratings.
